name: Read with Astérix: Astérix and Son
overview: READ WITH Asterix! Enjoy, with picture and sound, another exciting adventure of Asterix, the small but valiant Gaulish warrior whose very name fills foes with fear.In this story Asterix, more comfortable thumping Romans than changing nappies, finds himself adopted by a very special baby. Find out how he copes! This disc brings you the complete Asterix adventure, with: over 400 drawings in full colour almost 60 minutes of listening, as the story unfolds through the voices of over 40 characters.
